short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to manage all your Online Reputation Channels with your Wipass Business Dashboard account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a helper to be used together with Wipass Dashboard Customer Happiness feature that will connect all your Online Reputation Channels with your Wipass Business Dashboard account. Once you log in here you will be able to reply reviews left by your customers directly from the Wipass Dashboard.
